header.location: Rua D Sebastião 2050, Quinta do Conde, Portugal

hero.title: Dental Clinic
hero.subtitle: Healthy smile, specialized care
hero.description: We combine experience, modern technology and personalized attention to offer the best dental care for the whole family.

about.title: We care for your smile with
about.description: Dr. Sílvio Araújo Dental Clinic combines experience, modern technology and personalized attention to offer the best dental care. Led by Dr. Sílvio Araújo, our team ensures effective and affordable treatments for the whole family.

experience.title: Proven Experience
experience.description: More than 15 years dedicated to oral health

care.title: Personalized Care
care.description: Treatments adapted to each patient's needs

services.title: Complete dental
services.description: We offer a complete range of dental services to care for your family's oral health, with modern technology and qualified professionals.

tmj.title: Temporomandibular Dysfunction Treatment
tmj.description: Specialized treatment for jaw joint pain, headaches and muscle tension related to dental problems.

prices.title: Affordable
prices.description: We offer competitive prices and special discounts for members. Taking care of your smile has never been so affordable.

membership.title: Become a Member and Save
membership.description: With our membership plan, you have access to exclusive discounts on all treatments, free consultations and priority scheduling.

prices.note: * Prices shown are indicative and may vary according to treatment complexity. Contact us for a personalized quote.

team.title: Professionals
team.description: Meet the team that takes care of you and your family with professionalism, experience and a touch of affection.

member.name: Dr. Sílvio Araújo
member.description: Specialist in general dentistry and orthodontics, with extensive experience and dedication to each patient's care. Graduated from the Faculty of Dental Medicine, he leads the team with professionalism and empathy.
achievements: Member of the Portuguese Dental Association
member.quote: Our commitment is to provide the best dental care, with advanced technology and humane, personalized service.

amenities.title: We think about your
amenities.description: Our clinic offers various amenities to make your visit as pleasant as possible.

parking.title: Nearby Parking
parking.description: Parking spaces just a few meters away

appointment.title: Schedule your appointment
appointment.description: Fill out the form and our team will contact you to confirm your appointment.

form.privacyNote: By submitting, you agree to our privacy policy.

toast.title: Appointment Request Sent!
toast.description: We will contact you shortly to confirm your appointment.

testimonials.title: What our
testimonials.description: Our patients' satisfaction is our greatest reward. See what they say about their experience at our clinic.

review1.name: Maria Santos
review1.text: Excellent service! Dr. Sílvio is very professional and attentive. I always felt comfortable during treatments. I recommend to everyone!

review2.name: João Ferreira
review2.text: I did my orthodontic treatment here and I'm very satisfied with the results. Very friendly and competent team.

review3.name: Ana Costa
review3.text: The clinic is very modern and welcoming. Prices are fair and service is always punctual. My whole family is treated here.

review4.name: Pedro Oliveira
review4.text: I was very afraid of going to the dentist, but Dr. Sílvio made me feel completely at ease. Now I come to appointments without any fear.

review5.name: Sofia Martins
review5.text: I had a dental implant and everything went perfectly. Process well explained and excellent follow-up. Very satisfied!

article1.title: How to maintain good daily oral hygiene
article1.excerpt: Discover the best practices for brushing your teeth correctly and keeping your mouth healthy every day.

article2.title: Everything about teeth whitening
article2.excerpt: Learn about the different types of whitening and which one is best for your case.

article3.title: When to take children to the dentist?
article3.excerpt: Find out the ideal age for the first consultation and how to prepare children for the visit.

article4.title: Dental implants: complete guide
article4.excerpt: Everything you need to know about dental implants, from the procedure to recovery.

contact.title: Come
contact.description: We are located in Quinta do Conde, with easy access and nearby parking. Get in touch with us.

cta.title: Book Your Appointment Today!
cta.description: Don't wait any longer to take care of your smile. Our team is ready to welcome you.

footer.description: We care for your smile with dedication, modern technology and personalized treatments for the whole family.
